Hello!

I have a passion for R programming, data science, and teaching data literacy. 

I am currently the Data Science Manager at [doTERRA Int.](https://www.doterra.com/US/en) where I manage a team of data scientists working on a host of interesting business problems, applying many data science and analytics techniques, such as advanced forecasting, recommendation systems, statistical analysis, natural language processing, data visualization, machine learning, process automation, and web application development.
